content: What is KIX KairanX The KIX-Token is a unique response to present challenges and a promising future. With a focus on innovation, this project strives to positively shape society by inspiring those dedicated to pioneering technologies for lasting impact.KIX empowers technology and patents through the KIX Token, driving groundbreaking innovations. We are creating a gaming portal for intelligence-enhancing games with rewards. comments.body: Hi, is there any reason on why you cannot post any real pictures of your team members? In addition, one of your team members' photo is copied from a stock picture from the internet. This not only implies that the project may be a scam but ultimately deceives people into thinking about the genuineness of your project. Failure to reply or to explain your side would warrant a scam accusation against the project. Kindly check the reference below, thanks.REFERENCE:1 https://ru.pinterest.com/pin/504755070716703801/2 https://www.yandex.com/images/search?cbir_id=2905183%2Fz9z1a42Pri0UUIj_G554cw6659&rpt=imageview&text=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reverse-image-search.org%2Ftempimgs%2F8735333451696266656.png&url=https%3A%2F%2Favatars.mds.yandex.net%2Fget-images-cbir%2F2905183%2Fz9z1a42Pri0UUIj_G554cw6659%2Forig

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: qwertyup23 on October 02, 2023, 05:17:53 PMHi, is there any reason on why you cannot post any real pictures of your team members? In addition, one of your team members' photo is copied from a stock picture from the internet. This not only implies that the project may be a scam but ultimately deceives people into thinking about the genuineness of your project. Failure to reply or to explain your side would warrant a scam accusation against the project. They are planning to do an exit scam which is the reason that they are faking their team members, a legit project is more than proud to own its project by posting their credentials so people can check their background what they can give, and what they can accomplish, projects that's faking their credentials and plagiarize their whitepaper are considered scam.So it's easy to tell that this has the potential to scam their investors so people should take heed and let this be a warning.Let's see if the representative and the owner will show up to defend their project.
